mapper.select: SELECT a.ORDER_NO, b.USER_ID, c.WH_NAME, a.ORDER_PRICE, d.ORDER_STATUS_NAME, a.ORDER_DETAIL, a.ORDER_DATE FROM order_product a JOIN user b ON a.USER_NO = b.USER_NO JOIN warehouse_inf c ON b.WH_ID = c.WH_ID JOIN order_status d ON a.ORDER_STATUS_NO = d.ORDER_STATUS_NO WHERE b.USER_ID = #{userName}
